radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild atelectasis at the right lung base. Mild fatty deposition in the liver with a 6 mm enhancing lesion in the right hepatic lobe, likely a nonspecific perfusional difference. Stones and sludge filling the gallbladder with slight edema of the gallbladder wall. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilatation. Very mild fat stranding anterior to the pancreas, pancreatic duct is not dilated, and no stones within the pancreatic duct. Adrenal glands, spleen, kidneys are unremarkable. Visualized portions of stomach, small and large bowel are normal. No free fluid or lymphadenopathy. No concerning osseous lesions identified.
